title: Substitution effect for a normal good

content.question: Which of the following occurs as a result of the substitution effect of an increase in the price of a normal good?

choices.label: The demand for the good decreases.
The demand for the complementary good increases.
The demand for the good becomes more elastic.
The quantity demanded of the substitute good decreases.
The quantity demanded of the good decreases.

content.answer: The quantity demanded of the good decreases.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
